programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: When an elderly man, Edward, who always paid his rent on time, failed to do so, the apartment manager calls in a welfare check. As it turns out, Edward was tortured and murdered inside his apartment. Quinn and Vince hightail it to the scene and upon investigating, soon realize murder is not always accomplished…alone.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: A passionate relationship, a new home, a baby on the way: Avis Banks and Keyon Pittman seem to have it all, until Keyon returned home to find his beloved fiancé lifeless on the floor. In their hunt for Avis’ killer, investigators unearth a twisted love triangle, and a secret lover with a deadly obsession.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Tammi McCreary thought she had met the man of her dreams in Eric Perteet. A charismatic and ambitious doctor from Chicago, Eric quickly swept Tammi off her feet. But Eric was not what he seemed to be. Shortly after their wedding, Tammi's new husband is arrested at the local hospital, and she is faced with a string of shocking lies and the knowledge that she is not the only woman who has fallen prey to Eric's deceitful ways.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: Coral Watts’ murderous appetite is only getting worse with age as he tries to limit his exposure to law enforcement by getting out of town. Then, Stephen Hill takes his bromance a little too far and his jealousy may cost him everything.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Shy, anonymous twenty year old Debra Brown falls for serial child predator Alton Coleman and gets pulled into his twisted and deadly world. Later, seventeen year old Chakkira Wonnum escapes an abusive home only to run into the arms of a dangerous drug addict who forces her to commit an unspeakable act.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: Before the summer of 2010, 21-year-old Tiara Brown was a bright, young mother of two pursuing a nursing degree in Jacksonville, Florida. But with her husband deployed at sea and her marriage on the rocks, Tiara turns to Craigslist in search of male companionship—a choice that proves to be fatal. When Tiara’s body is found in the middle of a gruesome crime scene, investigators must carefully follow her online footprints to track down her ruthless killer before he strikes again.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: Baltimore is a vibrant city, but it’s also a town plagued by a history of violent crime. When the younger brother of the Baltimore Police Department’s spokesperson is gunned down in his apartment, the investigation reveals a suspect close to home.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: Brooklyn native Denetria Council fell head over heels for the handsome and charismatic Jason Page. But within months, a cloud of jealousy and obsession cast a dark shadow over their storybook romance. Then the dark feelings turn violent, and escalate into a gruesome nightmare with no escape in sight.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Abraham Kennard was a fast-talking pastor with an ambitious real estate investment opportunity. Hundreds of pastors and parishioners from churches across the country were lured by Kennard’s lavish lifestyle and promises of enormous returns. But though the millions poured in, the returns never poured out, revealing this supposed man of God…to be a man of greed.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: When U.S. Air Force veteran John Ray is found beaten and stabbed to death in his apartment, the crime scene looks like a random robbery. But Quinn and Velazquez look further into the secretive life of Ray and find that the murder was anything but random.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: Willa Blanc will put her son’s loyalty to the test when she takes an unrighteous path in search of riches… and later, Oklahoma drifter Cedric Norris’ road to redemption is suppressed by the devilish voices in his head.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Yvette Gay is a simple girl desperate for companionship and when she falls for an angry man, he drags her into a murderous plot. Vishawn Mills finds the man of her dreams but when an innocent friendship with the landlord intimidates her jealous boyfriend, her dream becomes a nightmare.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: The city of Atlanta has a rich history but with the city’s explosive growth, corruption has made its way into local politics. For one local Sheriff, a valiant attempt to clean it up results in a stunning, violent crime.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Valerie Payton was a hardworking mother who cared for her son dearly. So much in fact, she resorted to prostitution to give her son a better life than her own. One fateful evening, Valerie Payton lured a man who would do the unthinkable. After 10 years of Valerie’s unsolved case, Quinn and Vince hit the streets and uncover the monster behind Valerie Payton’s disappearance.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: Siohban Lee was a bubbly teen that you could always find on her phone scrolling through social media or hard at work earning money for college. That is, until she was found shot to death one wintery night in Washington DC. With almost nothing to go on from the scene of the crime, detectives turn to the pages of social media to find out who would want to hurt this beautiful barista. Little did they know, Siohban’s online accounts would lead them straight to her killer.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: Brooklyn native Denetria Council fell head over heels for the handsome and charismatic Jason Page. But within months, a cloud of jealousy and obsession cast a dark shadow over their storybook romance. Then the dark feelings turn violent, and escalate into a gruesome nightmare with no escape in sight.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: When hopeless romantic Rose Anglade met Paul Francois, she thought the Lord had finally given her someone she could grow old with. Eager to begin her new life with the man of her dreams, Rose takes Paul’s advice and sells her home in New York City and shares her assets with her soul mate. But unbeknownst to Rose, her smooth talking lothario has been carefully orchestrating his control over her finances, and when Francois disappears, it isn't just her money that he's taken.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: In California, self-proclaimed prophet, Marcus Wesson is a god to his family but those who don’t abide his word will pay the ultimate price. Later, Troy Graves unholy obsession unleashes hell on earth for his unwilling victims.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Vanessa Coleman is dangerously in love. She’ll stand by her man as he tortures a frightened couple in a drug-induced rage all while she watches. Then Tamika Jasper-Barbary marries a handsome, hard worker, but when his job gets them in hot water, Tamika risks it all to save her love.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: Columbus, Ohio is often described as a big city with a small-town personality. The community is left reeling when a hard-working local teenager is gunned down, and his own twin brother is arrested for the crime.

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: 14-year-old Shaniesha Forbes, was your typical American teenager. If she wasn’t hanging out with family or friends, she was busy scrolling through facebook, planning her next event on her busy social calendar. But when Shaniesha failed to come home from school or answer her phone in January of 2013, her mother knew something was terribly wrong. The search for the truth would expose the dark side of social media.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: Derrick and Linda Yancey have been together since high school. The young lovers got married soon after graduation and stayed devoted to each other for more than 20 years. But Derrick would become so infatuated with money that it eventually would cost him and Linda everything.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Corey Jenkins was a dual athlete with a potential pro career in either baseball or football. When the time comes to sign a management agency, Corey is convinced by local agents that they are the only agents that will look out for his true interests - the only agents he can trust. But while everything seems to run smoothly at first, Corey is soon faced with money problems, despite a substantial signing bonus he received when he was drafted. Slow to suspect his slick talking agents, by the time Corey realizes he has been victimized by the very people he trusted, it is too late.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Jimmie Atkins was well-liked by everyone in his neighborhood. Days pass and no one had seen or heard from him which was quite uncharacteristic. The APD were called and they discovered that he was murdered inside his own home. Quinn and Vince rush to the scene only to discover that people who you love and hold dearest to your heart, can make it stop beating.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: Tyrone Page tries to take the high road while his twin, Jerome, prefers lower alternatives but fate leads them both to life on the dark side. Then, AJ Nelson’s life of rejection and heartache leaves him destitute. With nothing to lose, someone will pay the ultimate price from his pursuit of wealth.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.desc: Troubled housewife Carolyn King deserts her family in search of a clean slate, only to find her perfect match in a local convict Bradley Martin. programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: 15-year-old Mikarah Sanders and 16-year-old Matthew DuBois were two typical teenagers in a whirlwind romance. The two were inseparable; when they weren’t together, they were messaging on MySpace. But when a New Year’s Eve in Seattle ends in the mysterious shooting of Mikarah and Matthew, police scour social media to piece together the crime. Their search for answers would reveal a tale of jealousy, rage, and the murder of an innocent teen.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.desc: When a beloved local reporter is gunned down in Oakland, California, his death reverberates throughout the city and his reporting on the activities of a local empowerment group are called into question.

programme.title: Atlanta Homicide
programme.desc: Demetrius Robbins was a stand-up husband and father who made it a point to serve his family, until one night where the unthinkable happened. Quinn and Vince go from a crime scene where there is no body, to rapidly piecing together that Demetrius Robbins is the victim in a much larger and horrific crime that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: Derrick and Linda Yancey have been together since high school. The young lovers got married soon after graduation and stayed devoted to each other for more than 20 years. But Derrick would become so infatuated with money that it eventually would cost him and Linda everything.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Tammi McCreary thought she had met the man of her dreams in Eric Perteet. A charismatic and ambitious doctor from Chicago, Eric quickly swept Tammi off her feet. Shortly after their wedding, Tammi's new husband is arrested at the local hospital, and she is faced with a string of shocking lies and the knowledge that she is not the only woman who has fallen prey to Eric's deceitful ways.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not
programme.desc: In Towson, MD young Lewin Powell III is known in his upper-middle class community as the good son. Later, church leaders Christy and Neil Edgar’s strong belief in discipline takes a deadly turn.

programme.title: For My Man

programme.title: #Murder
programme.desc: Siohban Lee was a bubbly teen that you could always find on her phone scrolling through social media or hard at work earning money for college. That is, until she was found shot to death one wintery night in Washington DC. With almost nothing to go on from the scene of the crime, detectives turn to the pages of social media to find out who would want to hurt this beautiful barista. Little did they know, Siohban’s online accounts would lead them straight to her killer.

programme.title: Sins of the City

programme.title: Fatal Attraction-Dupe
programme.desc: Samira Watkins had fallen hard for naval officer, Zachary Littleton. But when Samira inexplicably goes missing, the search to find her would unveil a tightly wound web of secrets and lies. And when this web begins to unravel, it exposes a hidden evil that will tear a family apart.

programme.title: Deceived
programme.desc: Abraham Kennard was a fast-talking pastor with an ambitious real estate investment opportunity. programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Detectives are baffled after a mother and daughter in an affluent family are murdered outside Louisville. A year later, a triple homicide in North Carolina sends detectives on an explosive search, linking the two cases through an unlikely suspect.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.desc: Danny’s a family man now and needs to upgrade his smile, damaged by past drug use. But he’s been burned by dentists before. Tattoo artist Craig claims that no one’s been able to give him teeth he won’t break. Will their faith in dentists be restored?

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Six people are slain in a home in a quiet Iowa town. One person survives a gunshot to the head and claims to have no memory of the incident. The tragedy and eventual trial shred the social fabric of the neighborhood.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Ed and Day venture to Verona and explore “the spot that’s more than a dot.” The guys play pickleball, dine on BBQ, get creative with splatter paint, and finish the day with a brew.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes exploiting online generosity are a growing trend. These real-life stories show people going to great lengths to con unsuspecting donors out of their money.

programme.title: Only In

programme.title: Eat Play Stay

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A 12-year-old paperboy's disappearance during his Sunday morning route shocks a peaceful Iowa city. Panic sets in when a second paperboy goes missing.

programme.title: New Hampshire Chronicle

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: Josh is a single gay man in the Kansas City area who's missing romance his busy life. On three blind dates, Josh is going to get his hands dirty at an art studio, get high in an aerial arts class, and get old school at the roller skating rink.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: From swimmers fueled by loved ones' unconditional support, to basketball and field hockey siblings driving each other toward greatness, see how family and sports are intertwined in the 'Burgh.

programme.desc: USA boxing champion and CEO of Milwaukee LSS Hector Colon brings Greg to meet locals who are championing their city. Greg steps in the boxing ring with Hector, learns the history of Milwaukee-style pizza, and experiences the growing Puerto Rican culture.

programme.title: Chronicle: Bring Them Home
programme.desc: (2017) Taken from their reservations, thousands of Native American children underwent an education experiment at the Carlisle Indian Industrial School. WGAL News 8's Matt Barcaro documents the Northern Arapaho's historic attempt to reclaim loved ones.

programme.title: Rickwood
programme.desc: This is the story of the oldest professional ballpark in the U.S. and the determination of its home team, the Black Barons. The voice of Rickwood tells the tale of its pivotal role in The Negro League, Black history and its legacy in American sports.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy

After four years of twists, turns and secrets revealed, Lynlee Renick goes to trial and Court TV's cameras are there for her testimony and a surprising sentence.

programme.desc: Scripps News puts the 2021 Marshall Fire into focus. programme.title: Sikh Temple Shooting
programme.desc: Scripps News revisits the the Sikh Temple in Wisconsin in the community of Oak Creek, a site of a tragic shooting on August 5, 2012, where seven worshipers lost their lives to an act fueled by hate and extremism. More than a decade later, we delve into the community's journey of healing, resilience, and the power of forgiveness.

programme.title: Puerto Rico's Power Crisis
programme.desc: What's behind the rampant blackouts in Puerto Rico leaving millions of Americans in the dark?

programme.title: Post-Trauma
programme.desc: Scripps News' Joey Maiocco goes on a personal journey to treat his post-traumatic stress and help other war veterans find their own treatment.

programme.title: Ukraine's Women Warriors
programme.desc: Reported from inside Ukraine. The call to fight for freedom is being answered by Ukrainian women, showcasing their strength and bravery.

programme.title: Weighing The Costs
programme.desc: Amid a surge in demand for weight loss drugs, concerns about safety are growing. Are these drugs effective? Are they safe?

programme.title: Scripps News Showcase: Made In Boise
programme.desc: Four women find purpose carrying babies for strangers in the conservative heartland of Boise, Idaho - the unregulated and unofficial `surrogacy capital' of the United States - and encounter unexpected complexities along the way.
